chatgpt.title: ChatGPT SaaS Complete Kit
chatgpt.description: Complete GPT-4 based SaaS solution with user auth, conversation management, token billing, and admin dashboard. Next.js 14 + OpenAI API.

imageGen.title: AI Image Generation Platform
imageGen.description: Image generation platform integrating DALL-E 3 and Stable Diffusion. Supports text-to-image, image-to-image, style transfer.

rag.title: LangChain RAG Template
rag.description: Enterprise-grade RAG knowledge base solution. Supports multiple document formats, vector database integration, intelligent Q&A. Python + LangChain.

voice.title: AI Voice Assistant Kit
voice.description: Complete voice assistant solution combining Whisper speech recognition and TTS. Multi-language support, real-time transcription, voice synthesis.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Quick Buyer AI Marketplace

whatGet.question: What do I get when I purchase an AI project?
whatGet.answer: You'll receive complete source code, detailed documentation, model files (if applicable), and all related resources. All projects include a commercial license allowing unlimited personal and commercial use.

updates.question: Are updates included after purchase?
updates.answer: Yes! All purchases include lifetime updates. When sellers release new versions, you can download them free from your dashboard. This is especially important in the fast-evolving AI field.

refund.question: Can I get a refund?
refund.answer: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, contact our support team and we'll process your refund.

payment.question: What payment methods are available?
payment.answer: All payments are securely processed through our payment partner Creem. We support all major credit cards, PayPal, and various local payment methods.

sell.question: Can I sell my own AI projects on Quick Buyer?
sell.answer: Absolutely! Register for a seller account and submit your AI projects for review. Once approved, you can start selling to our AI developer community.

types.question: What types of AI projects are available here?
types.answer: We offer a rich variety of AI project types including: LLM applications (ChatGPT clones, RAG systems), image generation, speech recognition, NLP tools, machine learning templates, AI Agent frameworks, and more.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs. No upfront costs, start selling your AI projects today.
pricing.trialInfo: All paid plans include a 14-day free trial. Cancel anytime.
pricing.customPlanLink: Contact us for a custom plan.

footer.description: The premium marketplace for AI projects, providing one-stop solutions for AI developers.
